channel.title: New User :: CIS 526 Textbook
channel.description: Creating a New User Now that we have a nice way to edit a user account, we’d like to also have a way to create a new user account. While we could easily duplicate our work in the UserEdit component and create a UserNew component, we can also add a bit more logic to our UserEdit component to handle both cases. So, let’s look at how we can do that!
